subject: Baseball
September 11 (2001)
lead_paragraph: The Mets held a somber ceremony at Citi Field before their Sunday night game with the Cubs, which ended with a Mets loss in the 11th inning.
snippet: The Mets held a somber ceremony at Citi Field before their Sunday night game with the Cubs, which ended with a Mets loss in the 11th inning.
